  const canvas = document.getElementById("canvas");
  const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');

  ctx.font = "31px serif";
  ctx.fillText("Hello World", 20, 40);
  ctx.fontVariantCaps = "small-caps";
  ctx.fillText("Hello World", 20, 80);
</script>
